heading: Today
text: Early sun giving way to clouds. Snow in NY late.

heading: Saturday
text: Snow tapering off west to east; increasing winds.
temperature: Zero to 15 north, teens to low 20s south, falling

heading: Sunday
text: Variable clouds and sun. Brisk winds, bitter cold.
temperature: 0 to 10 above, north to south. Morning wind chills 20 to 40 below.
